Summary: walking east on walnut st in boulder co looked up and saw what looked like 6 lights in a strait line formation with one light in the back moving in a half moon shape similar to this - - - - - - ) this formation moved across the sky at very high speeds
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Boulder
There were no other sightings in Boulder on or around March 15th 1999
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailshello i recently read statement for the case in ga 5-07-2008 near Atlanta ,and nothing caught my eye till i read about the two shooting stars sighted after the two ufos,,and something struck me about the trail the shooting star left behind ...i lived in Colorado in 1998-1999 and me and a few friends were walking east on walnut st in boulder Colorado approx date ??? but any way five of us just started walking to go have a few cocktails at a local establishment,and when i looked up in the sky almost overhead as i normally do when i go outside at night,i saw a trail of sorts in the sky with little lights in a strait line with one light in the rear of formation moving in a half moon shape behind the trail of 6 lights kind of like this - - - - - - ) and the whole formation moving together from the right to the left of the sky at speeds similar to a shooting star.. the first thing that came out of my mouth was oh my god a ufo and when my friends looked they too saw it still moving it moved out of our view because of a tree in the way and me and one of the group moved to the other side of the tree to follow it across the sky and it immediately broke formation in all directions all seven lights spread out across the sky at very very high speeds ,im an armature astronomer and know how to identify satellites,stars,meteors,fireballs,iridium flares,space shuttle,aircraft of human origin ... what we saw that night was none of those as I have witnessed them all..but i wanted to share the story because what i saw seems very similar to what the gentleman saw in Atlanta in fact when i read it i got goose bumps and had to write...the next day i called the astronomy club at the colorado u and told them what i saw the night before and they said other reports were also made about the sighting and that they didnt know what it was...
